sequences.description: Rotating carousel with multiple slides, each slide contains: large promotional text with percentage discount, price badge, data amount, descriptive text, and call-to-action button

Centered heading 'Already with Lyca?', three action buttons in a row (Top-up, Renew plan, Refer to friends), row of icon links below (My Account, Refer a Friend, Gift a plan, Find a store), and a promotional link at bottom
Centered heading 'Choose a SIM only plan today'
Two large promotional cards displayed side-by-side, each with: decorative graphics, percentage discount badge, price indicator, data amount, promotional text, features list, and call-to-action button
Horizontal banner with icon, text 'New! 4 latest add-ons', and arrow link
Three items displayed in a row, each with: circular icon, bold heading, and descriptive paragraph text

Two-column layout: left side has phone mockup image with decorative elements, right side has heading 'Download the Lyca Mobile and Rewards App', three feature bullet points with checkmarks, and two app store download buttons (Apple App Store and Google Play)
Centered heading 'We are here to help you'
Four circular icon buttons in a row, each with icon and label text below (FAQ, Help, My Account, Live chat)
Centered heading 'Cheap international calls for everyone'
Horizontal scrollable carousel of country flags with labels, navigation arrows on both sides, showing multiple country options
Three blog cards displayed in a row, each with: feature image, article title, metadata (author, date, read time), and navigation arrows for carousel
Centered heading 'Sign up to get exclusive offers', descriptive text below, email input field with submit button, and disclaimer text

excludedElements.header: Top navigation bar with logo, menu items, account and cart icons
excludedElements.footer: Bottom footer with multiple link columns and social media icons
